GSP31tsc_bhau:4: puruṣaḥ sa jayatyādyaḥ sā ca prakṛtirīśvarī /
GSP31tsc_bhau:11: yebhyo vivektavyo yaśca vivecanīyaḥ tadubhayaṃ sūtratrayeṇoddiśati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:19: tathā prakṛtiparyāyā avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ brahma akṣaraṃ kṣetraṃ tamaḥ māyā brāhmī vidyā avidyā prakṛtiḥ śaktiḥ ajā ityādayaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:20: sattvādiguṇavatī sattvādyatiriktā prakṛtiriti tu na śaṅkanīyam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:22: sattvādīnāmataddharmatvaṃ tadrūpatvāditi sāṃkhyapravacanasūtreṇa sattvādīnāṃ prakṛtisvarūpatvahetunā prakṛtidharmatvapratiṣedhāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:23: prakṛterguṇa ityādivākyaṃ tu vanasya vṛkṣā itivad boddhavyam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:24: “sattvaṃ rajastama iti prakṛterabhavan guṇā” iti prakṛtikāryatvavacanaṃ tu guṇanityatāvākyavirodhena mahattattvakāraṇībhūtakāryasattvādiparameva /
GSP31tsc_bhau:25: mahadādisṛṣṭirhi guṇavaiṣamyācchrūyate tacca vaiṣamyaṃ sajātīyasaṃvalanena prakāśādiphalopahitaḥ sattvādivyavahārayogyaḥ kāraṇaguṇānāṃ pariṇāma iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:27: sattvāditrayaṃ aha dravyatve 'pi puruṣopakaraṇatvād guṇā ityucyante /
GSP31tsc_bhau:31: tāni ca sattvādīni pratyekaṃ saṃkhyāvyaktikāni laghutvādidharmairanyonyaṃ sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca guṇānāmiti sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:32: atra hi sūtraṃ laghutvādinā bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ sādharmyaṃ tenaiva rajastamobhyāṃ vaidharmyam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:33: evaṃ ca laghutvādinā bahūnāṃ rajasāṃ gurutvādinā bahūnāṃ tamasāṃ sādharmyavaidharmye ukte iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:34: teṣu tritvavacanaṃ tu sattvatvādivibhājakopādhitrayeṇaiva vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ navadravyavacanavaditi /
GSP31tsc_bhau:40: sa ca virudhyata iti cet maivam gandhasya pṛthivīvyāpakatvavatprakṛtervyāpakatvam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:45: prakṛtyanumānaṃ cetthaṃ mahadādikāryaṃ pakṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakadravyakāryamiti sādhyaṃ kāryatve sati sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvāditi hetuḥ vastrādikāryaśayyāsanavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:47_0: nanu sukhasyāntarevānubhavāt śayyāsanādau sukhe kiṃ pramāṇaṃ yena dṛṣṭāntatā syāditi
GSP31tsc_bhau:47_1: cenna kāraṇaguṇā hi kāryaguṇānārabhante iti nyāyena viṣayeṣu triguṇakāryeṣu sukhaduḥkhamohasiddheḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:47_3: sukhādyucitaṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādakatvācca tadgatameva sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ sidhyati antaḥkaraṇasukhādihetutayā
GSP31tsc_bhau:48: kālādibhedairekasyā eva tryādivyakteḥ sukhaduḥkhotpādakatvācca tadgatameva sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ siddhyati //
GSP31tsc_bhau:56: mano matirmahān brahmā pūrvaṃ buddhirvṛttiḥ khyātiḥ prajñā santatiḥ smṛtiriti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:59: buddhiḥ prajñopalabdhiśca tathā brahmā vṛttiḥ smṛtiḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:62: sarvataḥ śrutimāṃlloke sarvaṃ vyāpya sa tiṣṭhati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:66: idameva mahattattvamaṃśato rajastamaḥsambhedena pariṇataṃ sat vyaṣṭijīvānāmupādhiradharmādiyutaṃ kṣudramapi bhavati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:70: idameva mahattattvaṃ kāryeśvarasya svayambhuva upādhistenaivopādhinā sa sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvakarttā sarvapālakaḥ sarvasaṃharttā ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:76: sa ca svayambhūḥ kriyāśaktimat kevalamahattattvopādhikaḥ sūtrātmetyucyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:78: samagrasuṣuptau tu samagralayena nirviśeṣacinmātrasvarūpeṇāvasthānādīśvara ityucyate śrutismṛtipurāṇeṣu mahāṃstridhā taduktaṃ vaiṣṇave /
GSP31tsc_bhau:83: jñānena mokṣaḥ vairāgyeṇa prakṛtilayaḥ puruṣatattvānabhijñasya vairāgyāt prakṛtilayo bhavati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:85: prakṛticintakānadhikṛtya “pūrṇaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhanti vigatajvarā” iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:87: tatra vairāgyapūrvakaṃ teṣu teṣvātmabhāvenopāsyamāneṣu layo hi prakṛtāviti ca śrūyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:91: bauddhā daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti vigatajvarāḥ // iti ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:92: ayaṃ ca prākṛtiko bandha ityucyate yogibhiḥ mahadādibhāvaśca vaikṛtiko bandha iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:103: ahaṅkāro 'bhimānaśca karttā mantā ca sa smṛtaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:104: ātmā ca prakulo jīvo yataḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:123: tāni ca pañca śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rūpatanmātraṃ rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātraṃ ceti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:124: śāntaghoramūḍhāḥ pañcasvapi viśeṣāḥ śabdatvasparśatvādivyāpyā jātiviśeṣā eva /
GSP31tsc_bhau:129: rase madhuratvādayo viśeṣāste ca madhuratiktakaṣāyakaṭvamlakṣārāḥ ṣaḍrasāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:132: teṣāṃ paryāyāḥ tanmātrāṇi tamovigrahāḥ sūkṣmavigrahāḥ sūkṣmabhūtāni aviśeṣā iti //
GSP31tsc_bhau:138: ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ca ete ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:141: tatra uccāraṇaṃ vācaḥ hastayorādānaṃ pādayorgatiḥ pāyorutsargaḥ upasthasyānandaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:146: atha paryāyāḥ indriyāṇi karaṇāni nipātanāni vaikārikāṇi taijasāni /
GSP31tsc_bhau:161: bhūtāni vikārā viśeṣā ākṛtayaḥ tamovigrahāḥ śāntā ghorā mūḍhā iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:166: anādiḥ sūkṣmaścetanaḥ sarvagataḥ nirguṇaḥ kūṭastho nityo draṣṭā bhoktā kṣetravit amanaḥ prasavadharmā ceti svarūpam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:170: atha paryāyāḥ puruṣa ātmā pumān pudgalajantuḥ jīvaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ naraḥ kaviḥ brahma akṣaraḥ prāṇaḥ jñaḥ yaḥ kaḥ sa eka iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:174: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vā 'pi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:175: sa ca puruṣo nānā sukhaduḥkhamohajanmamaraṇabandhamokṣavyavasthātaḥ janmādivyavasthātaḥ puruṣabahutvamiti sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:176: yadyekaḥ puruṣaḥ syādekasmin sukhite sarve sukhitāḥ syuḥ evaṃ sarvatra evaṃ puruṣabahutvaṃ siddham /
GSP31tsc_bhau:177: evaṃ tāvat sāṃkhyācāryāḥ kapilāsuripañcaśikhapatañjaliprabhṛtayo yasmāt paraṃ nāparamasti kiñciditi nyāyavaiśeṣikāśca bahūn puruṣānātmatvena vadanti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:178: aupaniṣadāścācāryā hariharahiraṇyagarbhavyāsādayaḥ ebhyo 'tiriktamekameva nityeśvaraṃ sarveṣāmātmānaṃ vadanti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:181: tadakṣaraṃ tadvibhurvareṇyaṃ yasmāt paraṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca vasatyeko mahānātmā yena sarvamidaṃ tatam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:184: ekameva yathā sūtraṃ suvarṇe varttate punaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:189: sāṃkhyāstu ādipuruṣaviṣayatayā layāvaśiṣṭanirviśeṣacinmātraviṣayatayā vā etāni śrutivākyāni yojayanti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:194: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:195: idānīṃ prathamasūtreṇaiva guṇātmakaprakṛteruddiṣṭatve 'pi guṇānāmavāntaravibhāgaṃ taddharmāṃśca vivecayituṃ vakṣyamāṇasañcarapratisañcaropodghātasaṅgatyā ca sūtraṃ pravarttate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:198: sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ teṣāṃ samāhārastriguṇaṃ triguṇameva traiguṇyam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:207: idānīṃ saguṇanirguṇaśrutiviṣayopapattyarthaṃ sargādāvutpannaṃ svayambhuvaṃ pralayāvaśiṣṭanirviśeṣacitsāmānyaṃ ca darśayituṃ sṛṣṭipralayayoḥ sūtradvayaṃ pravartate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:214_0: sargādau svayameva kṣubdhā satī bhāvinārāyaṇabījabhūtā pūrvakalpe svayambhūpālakena
GSP31tsc_bhau:214_1: nāmakena vyaktena nārāyaṇapuruṣeṇa saṃyujyate tataśca sajātīyairanyaiḥ prakṛtyaṃśairnyūnādhikabhāvena
GSP31tsc_bhau:215_0: nanu puruṣasya prakṛtisaṃyogitve asaṃyogo hyayaṃ puruṣa iti śrutivirodha iti cenna
GSP31tsc_bhau:216: tatra mahattattvasya svarūpeṇa mukhyotpattiḥ cetanasya tu abhivyaktirūpā kāryatā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:225: tataḥ parisphuratyādau sarge tailaṃ tilādiva // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:229: vyaktāṃ karoti nityāṃ tāṃ prakṛtiṃ paramaḥ pumān // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:233: saiva prakṛtyadhiṣṭhātrī devatā mahālakṣmī ambā bhavānī haimavatī durgā ityādipadairabhilapyate purāṇādiṣu /
GSP31tsc_bhau:234: saiva ca līlāvigrahairādipuruṣeṇa militā satī sṛṣṭiṃ pālayati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:236: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:237: na cedevaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditumapi / iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:240: etasmānmahato guṇāntarasaṃvalitāt trividho 'haṅkāra utpadyate cetanācetanātmakaḥ vaikāriko rājasastāmasaśceti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:241: tataścāhaṅkārāt saṅkalpapūrvakaṃ dehendriyāṇi pañca tanmātrāṇi cotpadyante /
GSP31tsc_bhau:242: svayabhuva indriyāṇi devatārūpāṇi vaikārikāt vyaṣṭīndriyāṇi ca taijasāt teṣvindriyeṣvādau mana utpadyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:248: tanmātreṣu tvasti sa yathā ahaṃkārācchabdatanmātraṃ tasmādahaṃkārotpannācchabdatanmātrādahaṃkārasahitāt sparśatanmātraṃ śabdasparśobhayaguṇakam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:251: tatrāhaṅkārāt pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ taddvārā pañcamahābhūtānāṃ cotpattau purāṇe krama uktaḥ sa yathā
GSP31tsc_bhau:255: vāyurutpadyate tasmāt tasya sparśo guṇo mataḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:259: teṣu pañcamahābhūtāni varjjayitvā 'haṃkāraṃ ca buddhau praveśya saptadaśakaṃ liṅgaśarīrasañjñaṃ bhavati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:261: tacca sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ svasvabījabhūtaprakṛtisaṃyogāt sargādāvutpadya prākṛtapralayaparyantaṃ tiṣṭhati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:263: prāṇaśca buddhereva vṛttibheda ityato liṅaśarīre pṛthak na nirdiśyate buddhāvevāntarbhāvāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:264: tasya ca liṅgaśarīrasya paramasūkṣmāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni tejaḥpradhānānyāśrayaḥ citrādivat āśrayaṃ vinā lokāntaragamanāsambhavāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:266: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā chāyā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:267: tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // iti
GSP31tsc_bhau:268_0: idaṃ ca liṅgaśarīramādau svayambhuvaḥ samaṣṭicetanasya upādhibhūtamekameva samaṣṭirūpaṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:268_1: jāyate tataśca vyaṣṭijīvānāmapyupādhibhūtāni vyaṣṭiliṅgaśarīrāṇi tadaṃśabhūtāni tato
GSP31tsc_bhau:276: svayambhūḥ svaliṅgaśarīrāvayavān sūkṣmānalpān ātmamātrāsu svāṃśacetaneṣu saṃyojya sarvaprāṇinaḥ sasarjeti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:280_1: vāyuḥ vāyāvapi tejaḥ tejasi daśaguṇe jalaṃ tathaiva jalasyāpi daśaguṇasya madhye
GSP31tsc_bhau:280_2: pṛthvī samutpadyate saiva sthūlaśarīrasya bījamaṇḍarūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:281: tasyāpi daśaguṇitasyāṇḍasya pṛthivyāvaraṇasya madhye caturdaśabhuvanātmakaṃ svayambhuvaḥ sthūlaśarīraṃ tatsaṅkalpādevotpadyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:288: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:290: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:291: tā yadasyāyanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:293: tata evādipuruṣādvyaṣṭipuruṣāṇāṃ vibhāgāt ante ca tatraiva layāt sa evaika ātmeti śrutismṛtyorvyavahriyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:294: tataśca sa nārāyaṇo virāṭśarīrī pṛthivīrūpasvanābhikamalakarṇikāsthānīyasya sumerorupari caturmukhamavāntarabrahmāṇaṃ sṛṣṭvā taddvārānyānapi vyaṣṭiśarīriṇaḥ sthāvarāntān sasarja /
GSP31tsc_bhau:300: dainandinapralayeṣveva hi nārāyaṇaśarīre praviśyaikībhūya suptānāṃ devānāṃ caturmukhādikrameṇāvirbhāvaḥ śeṣaśāyinaḥ sakāśād ghaṭate na tvādisargeṣu /
GSP31tsc_bhau:302: asyāṃ sṛṣṭau mahattattvasya buddhipūrvakaḥ triguṇātmakaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:304: svayambhuvo 'ṅgadevatāḥ svayabhūśca sthūladehanairapekṣyeṇa jñānavattvāt videhā devā ityucyante /
GSP31tsc_bhau:309: taduktaṃ sa īśo yadvaśe māyā sa jīvo yastayārdita iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:316: ete ca sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārarūpāḥ sthūlā eva pariṇāmāḥ kūṭasthapuruṣavivekāya pradarśitāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:321: ata eva sarvaṃ jaḍavastu paramārthataḥ sarvadaiva asaducyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:327: tadeva sadeva saumyedamagra āsīt ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahmetyādiśrutiṣu sadbrahmādipadavācyam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:329: idānīmantakālīnabhagavatsmaraṇasya paramagatihetutvaśravaṇāt tatsmaraṇasya ca sādhyātmasādhibhūtasādhidaivabhagavadanucintanajanyatvādadhyātmādivibhāgaḥ pradarśyate sūtratrayeṇa /
GSP31tsc_bhau:332: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // iti
GSP31tsc_bhau:333: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:334: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te viduryuktacetasaḥ // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:380: devatāmadhikṛtya vartata ityadhidaivatam karaṇābhimānidevatāvargaḥ etatsahiteśvarānucintitasyāntakālīnabhagavatsmṛtyā paramagatiḥ phalam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:383: tattvāni yo vedayate yathāvad guṇasvarūpāṇyadhidaivataṃ ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:384: vimuktapāpmā gatadoṣasaṅgho guṇāṃstu bhuṅkte na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate //
GSP31tsc_bhau:388: guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi tānyeva svarūpāṇi tāttvikarūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tāni guṇasvarūpāṇi adhidaivatañca adhyātmādhibhūtayorupalakṣaṇam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:390: na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate guṇavaśo na bhavatītyarthaḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:394_0: tatra pañcasroto 'mbuṃ pañcayonyugracakrāṃ pañcaprāṇormiṃ pañcabuddhyādimūlām pañcāvarttāṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:397: tatrābhibuddhirnāma abhimukhī buddhiḥ idamavaśyaṃ karaṇīyamitirūpā buddhivṛttiḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:404: karmajanyāḥ karmajanakāśca dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā 'vividiṣā vividiṣā ceti pañca //
GSP31tsc_bhau:408: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ śraddhāyā lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam //
GSP31tsc_bhau:413: ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca nityaṃ cedamacetanam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:414: sūkṣmaṃ satkāryamakṣobhyaṃ jñeyā vividiṣā hi sā //
GSP31tsc_bhau:420: ete pañca kriyāśaktimadantaḥkaraṇavṛttibhedā api vāyusamānagatikatvādvāyudevatākatvācca vāyava ityuktam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:429: vaikārikastaijaso bhūtādiḥ sānumāno niranumānaśceti karmātmānaḥ karmiṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:436: idānīṃ pañcāśadbhedāṃ pañcaparvāmadhīma iti śrutyarthopapattaye buddheḥ pañcāśatsargān bahubhiḥ sūtrairuddiśati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:439: sā ca pañcadhā avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśajanakatvāt kleśā iti yoge paribhāṣitāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:441: asmitā anātmanyahaṃvṛttiḥ avidyāsmitayorayaṃ bhedaḥ avidyāyāmadhikaraṇamapi pṛthag bhāsate 'smitāyāṃ tvāroparūpatve 'pi nādhikaraṇaṃ bhāsate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:445: viduṣāmapi svarasavāhī anādimaraṇaduḥkhānubhavajanitavāsanājanyaḥ śrutismṛtipurāṇeṣu ete avidyābhedāstamaādiśabdaiḥ paribhāṣitāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:447: te ca viṣayabhedāt dviṣaṣṭibhedāḥ te yathā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:449: devā aṇimādyaṣṭavidhamaiśvaryamāsādya vayamamṛtā ityabhimānino bhavanti so 'yamabhimāno moho 'ṣṭāvidhaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:450: dṛṣṭānuśravikeṣu dvādaśasu viṣayeṣu prāpteṣu mukto 'hamiti manyate so 'bhimāno rāgātiśayanimittatvāt mahāmoho daśavidhaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:451: aṇimādyaṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhaviṣaye ca pratihatasya krodhād yadduḥkhamutpadyate sa tāmisro 'ṣṭādaśavidhaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:452: devā aṇimādyaṣṭakamaiśvaryaṃ śabdādīṃśca daśa viṣayān bhuñjānāḥ kṣayaśaṅkayā 'tra santi satāsa evāṣṭādaśavidho 'ndhatāmiśra iti dviṣaṣṭibhedā pañcaparvā avidyā //
GSP31tsc_bhau:476: yathā nānātmajño mukta iti śrutvā viparītaṃ pratipanno nānātmajño 'hamamukta iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:482: svadānamanarthakaṃ jñātvā dānapātrasya guruṇi duḥkhe jāte pramodaḥ pramuditā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:489: kutaścit sarvākāreṇa pariṇamamānā prakṛtireva jñānaṃ kariṣyatīti śrutvā yā tuṣṭiḥ sā prakṛtyākhyā tasyā asteti saṃjñā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:490: pravrajyayaiva jñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śrutvā pravrajyopādānena yā tuṣṭiḥ sā salilasaṃjñā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:491: kālenaiva jñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śrutvā pravrajyayā bahukālena yā tuṣṭiḥ sā ādyetyucyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:492: bhāgyenaiva jñānaṃ bhaviṣyati madālasā bālakānāmiveti kutaścicchrutvā yā tuṣṭiḥ sā vṛṣṭiritisaṃjñā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:494_1: tuṣṭiḥ apāramucyate dvitīyā supāraṃ tṛtīyā pāram anuttamāmbhasikā caturthī uttamāmbhaḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:500: bhagavatkṛpāvaśādūhanena tarkeṇaiva jñānamutpadyate sā prathamā siddhistāretyucyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:501: śabdaśravaṇamātrādeva yad jñānaṃ sā dvitīyā sutārā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:502: śiṣyabhāvenādhyayanena yad jñānaṃ sā tṛtīyā tāratāreti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:506: yat suhṛtsaṃsargitayā jñānaṃ sā saptamī ramyaketi /
GSP31tsc_bhau:508: āsu prathamāstisro duḥkhavighātātmakānāṃ mukhyānāṃ tisḥṇāṃ siddhīnāmaṅkuśa ākarṣakaḥ sādhaka iti yāvat siddhayastvetā eva /
GSP31tsc_bhau:511: idānīṃ sāṃkhyaśāstrasya ṣaṣṭitantratvapratipādanāya pañcāśatsu siddhisargeṣu daśānyān pūrayati sūtreṇa /
GSP31tsc_bhau:514: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:516: tatrāstitvaṃ dvayordharmaḥ ekatvaṃ sargabhedena nānātvābhāvarūpaṃ prakṛteḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:523: jīvanmuktasya saṃskāramātreṇa cakrabhramivaccharīrasya yā sthitiḥ sā śeṣavṛttiḥ puruṣasya /
GSP31tsc_bhau:524: iti daśapadārthāḥ pratyayasargākhyāḥ pañcāśat pūrvoktāḥ ete ca daśa mūlikāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:528: pañcatanmātrā anugṛhyopādānakāraṇatvena svīkṛtya yaḥ sargaḥ so 'nugrahasargaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:529: pañcānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sacaturmukhasanakādīnāṃ svasya līlāvigrahe sargo bhaktānamanugrahārthaṃ so 'pyanugrahasargaḥ pañcatanmātrebhya eva //
GSP31tsc_bhau:548: prākṛtiko vaikṛtiko dākṣiṇa iti trayo bandhāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:551: tṛtīyastu gṛhasthādīnāṃ kāmopahatacetasāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadatāṃ dakṣiṇābandhaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:553: prākṛtena tu bandhena tathā vaikārikeṇa ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:556: ādau tu mokṣo jñānena dvitīyo rāgasaṃkṣayāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:575: idaṃ tu jñānopadeṣṭurevāptalakṣaṇam vastuto yathābhūtārthasyopadeṣṭā puruṣa ityeva //
GSP31tsc_bhau:577_0: ubhābhyāṃ yanna siddhaṃ tacchabdapramāṇena sidhyati yathendro devānāṃ rājā uttarāḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:577_1: kuravaḥ sauvarṇo meruḥ svarge 'psarasaḥ ete padārthā na pratyakṣānumānagamyāḥ kintu śabdaikagamyāḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:579: antaḥkaraṇasyendriyāṇāṃ cāvibhaktaḥ saṅkocavikāsaśālyagrabhāgo vṛttirabhyupeyate bhāgaguṇābhyāṃ tattvāntaraṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhārthaṃ sarpatīti sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:581_1: sahārthākārā pariṇamate sā cārthākārā vṛttirguṇarūpā sarvātmanāṃ vibhutve 'pi svasvāminyevātmani
GSP31tsc_bhau:581_3: pratibimbaścādhiṣṭhānagatāyā buddhervikāraḥ pariṇāmaḥ svattvaṃ ca svāmiprakāśitavṛttijanyasaṃskāravattvam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:582_0: svāmitvaṃ ca svaniṣṭhasaṃskārajanakavṛttiprakāśakatvaṃ sā ca vṛttirātmani sthitā
GSP31tsc_bhau:582_1: satī arthākārā ātmākārā ca svasamānākāraṃ pariṇāmāntaraṃ dhatte sa evātmani vṛttipratibimbo
GSP31tsc_bhau:582_2: viṣayatākhyaḥ sambandha iti tadavacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ pratyakṣapramā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyākārārthātmaviṣayiṇī taduktam //
GSP31tsc_bhau:586_0: iyaṃ ca pratyakṣā vṛttirviṣayadeśe jāyamānā tatraivātmani pratibimbate ātmano vibhutvāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:586_1: yatra cendriyadvāraṃ vinā manaḥ svavāsanāvaśādyatrārthena sambaddhyate tatra tadākārā
GSP31tsc_bhau:594: yathārthapadasmṛtijanyā padārthasaṃsargākārā vṛttiḥ śabdapramāṇam tatpratibimbāvacchinnacaitanyaṃ śābdī pramā idaṃ pramāṇadvayamāntarameva /
GSP31tsc_bhau:595_0: aparokṣatvaṃ parokṣatvaṃ smṛtitvaṃ saṃśayatvaṃ viparyayatvaṃ pramātvamapramātvaṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:595_1: ca sarve vṛttidharmā eva tatpratibimbavaśāccaitanye 'pyupacaryante tatrāparokṣatvaparokṣatvasmṛtitvāni
GSP31tsc_bhau:596: yatra yannāsti tatra tanniścayo viparyayaḥ yathārthavṛttiḥ pramā ayathārthavṛtirapramā atra pramātrādivibhāgaviṣaye vijñānācāryāṇāṃ kārikā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:597: pramātā cetanaḥ śuddhaḥ pramāṇaṃ vṛttireva ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:602: jñānasya ca janyatvaṃ vināśitvamātmadharmatvaṃ ca pratibimbāvacchinnatvenopapādanīyam ātmarūpasya jñānasya nityatvāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:603: viśiṣṭe hi vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṃkrāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādha iti nyāyāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:604: ādhārādheyabhāvo 'pi khe khagodaya itivadupapādanīyaḥ vṛttīnāmātmani pratibimbe pramāṇam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:609: atra śāstre 'nuktāḥ svāvirodhinaḥ śāstrāntarīyā api padārthāḥ grāhyāḥ sārādānaṃ ṣaṭpadavaditi sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:610: sarvataḥ sāramādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpada iti smṛteśca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:617: anena trividhaduḥkhenābhibhūtasya tarati śokamātmaviditi śrutvā ātmani jijñāsā jāyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:620: [etatparaṃ yāthārthyaṃ etajjñātvā kṛtakṛtyaḥ syānna punastrividhaduḥkhenābhibhūyate // Tats_25 //]
GSP31tsc_bhau:621_1: idaṃ tu tatkathanena pūrṇaṃ śrutisammatatvācca paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:622_1: tasmānmahanmahato 'haṅkārastataḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi tebhyo bhūtāni iti spaṣṭameva sāṃkhyayogoktamahadādikrameṇa
GSP31tsc_bhau:626: pūrvoktatrividhaduḥkhena na yujyate duḥkhātyantanivṛttirūpo mokṣo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:627: nanu duḥkhaṃ tāvat trividham anāgataṃ vartamānamatītaṃ ceti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:629: anāgato ghaṭo varttamāno ghaṭo 'tīto ghaṭa ityavasthātraye 'pi ghaṭasyāvasthādharmiṇo 'nugatapratyayāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:631: na ca tatkāle kathamabhāvapratyaya iti vācyam varttamānapratiyogikasāmayikātyantābhāvenaiva tadupapatteriti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:632: evaṃ cānagatātītaduḥkhayorabhāve 'pi na puruṣārthaḥ bhogyaduḥkhābhāvasyaiva puruṣārthatvāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:633_0: vartamānaduḥkhaṃ ca bhogyamapi bhogenaiva naṅkṣyatīti tadabhāvo na puruṣārthaḥ puruṣaprayatnanirapekṣatvāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:633_1: puruṣaprayatnasāpekṣasyaiva puruṣārthatvāt tathā ca kathaṃ duḥkhābhāvasya bhogyahetutayā
GSP31tsc_bhau:633_2: tadabhāvasya ca puruṣakṛtisādhyatayā puruṣārthatvaṃ duḥkhahetūcchede puruṣavyāparāt prāyaścittavaditi /
GSP31tsc_bhau:635: heyaṃ duḥkhamanāgataṃ vivekakhyātiravitpravā hānopāya iti sūtradvayena /
GSP31tsc_bhau:636: sāṃkhyānāṃ ca sarvātmanāmavaidharmyābheda eva tattvamasivākyārtho nāvibhāgādiḥ tajjñānasyaivābhimānanivarttakatvāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:637: tadvākyasya ca śvetaketoranūcānatvādyabhimānanivṛttyarthameva pravṛtteḥ tathā ca layāvaśiṣṭacitsāmānyaṃ tatpadārthaḥ taduktaṃ vijñānācāryavaryairasmadgurubhirbhāṣyādyaślokena /
GSP31tsc_bhau:638: eko 'dvitīya iti vedavacāṃsi puṃsi sarvābhimānavinivartanato 'sya muktyai /
GSP31tsc_bhau:639: vaidharmyalakṣaṇabhidā virahaṃ vadanti nākhaṇḍatāṃ kha iva dharmaśatāvirodhāt // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:640_3: cāntaḥkaraṇasya nāśenaiva trividhaduḥkhātyantanivṛttirūpo mokṣo bhavatīti paramakṛtakṛtyatā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:644: aparokṣyabhrame hi samānaviśeṣyakā 'parokṣyaviparītaniścayasyaiva nivartakatvāvadhāraṇāt taduktaṃ vāsiṣṭhe /
GSP31tsc_bhau:648: na naśyati tamo rāma kṛtayā dīpavārtayā // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:649: evamabhyāsāt komalakaṇṭakanyāyena jñāne jāte yogarūḍha ityucyate yogī asmāt pūrvastu yuñjānaḥ tataḥ paramahaṃsāśrameṇa vikṣepakāṇi karmāṇi tyaktvā jñānaniṣṭhāparyantamabhyaset /
GSP31tsc_bhau:651: tataḥ sa yukto jīvanmukto guṇātīta iti cocyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:659: anyaccātra sāṃkhyavidyāyāṃ bhagavadbhakterevāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvaṃ jñeyam anyathā devakṛtavighnairyogadhvaṃso bhavatyeva yathoktaṃ bhāgavate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:661: āruhya kṛcchreṇa paraṃ padaṃ tataḥ patantyadho 'nādṛtayuṣmadaṅdhrayaḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:662: śreyaḥśrutiṃ bhaktimudasya te vibho kliśyanti ye kevalabodhalabdhaye /
GSP31tsc_bhau:663: teṣāmasau kleśala eva śiṣyate nānyadyathā sthūlatuṣāvaghātinām // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:664: idānīṃtanāḥ kecana vaiṣṇavā etādṛśavākyairbhagavadbhaktiṃ puraskṛtya sāmānyato jñānamārgaṃ khaṇḍayati te tu vidyāvivekānabhijñāḥ sthūlamataya eva /
GSP31tsc_bhau:668: citte hi svavaśe yogaḥ siddhyet tattu jagatpatim /
GSP31tsc_bhau:674: sa guṇān samatītyaiva brahmabhūyāya kalpyate // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:675: brahmabhūyāya pūrṇatvenābhivyaktaye guṇābhidhānaṃ tattadavacchinnatvenaivābhivyajyate tasmād bhagavadbhaktireva mukhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sāṃkhyayogavidyāyāmiti siddham /
GSP31tsc_bhau:677: tena me prīyatāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ paramātmā jagadguruḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:681: tebhyaṃ samarpitaṃ caitat tenāpi prīyatāṃ hariḥ //
